solution_line_template: Each book has {words_per_book} words because {words_per_page} x {pages_per_book} = <<{words_per_page}*{pages_per_book}={words_per_book}>>{words_per_book}
She can finish each book in {minutes_per_book} minutes because {words_per_book} / {words_per_minute} = <<{words_per_book}/{words_per_minute}={minutes_per_book}>>{minutes_per_book}
She will be reading for {total_reading_minutes} minutes because {reading_hours} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{reading_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_reading_minutes}>>{total_reading_minutes}
She needs to check out {num_books} books because {total_reading_minutes} / {minutes_per_book} = <<{num_books}={num_books}>>{num_books}
